attributes.action: Find homes for as many Syrian refugees as possible in the Forest of Dean.
attributes.background: If the Forest of Dean district council are willing to find homes for just 50 people who are currently living in slums, trying to escape their war-torn country then that's 50 people whose lives will be changed for the better. Please help and make a difference.

rejection.details:
This looks like a request for Forest of Dean District Council to take action. The council has its own e-petitions system. You can find out more here:

http://www.fdean.gov.uk/nqcontent.cfm?a_id=7484

You could also raise this issue with local councillors. You can find out who your councillors are here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
